Quick functions to use [**mapgl**](https://github.com/walkerke/mapgl)!


```{r quickdemo}

library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(mapglview)

# get cities/places in Rhode island
plcs <- tigris::places(state = 44
                       ) |> 
  rename_with(tolower)


# create a quick map with place boundaries, colored by name
plcs |> 
  select(1:5) |> 
  st_boundary() |> 
  mapglview(zcol = "name")
  

# also get point data footprints from open street maps/geofabrik
ri.osm <- osmextract::oe_get(
  place = "us/rhode-island"
  ,layer = "points"
  ,provider = "geofabrik"
)

ri.pts <- ri.osm  |> 
  filter(!is.na(man_made))

# add the building footprints by over top map with the place boundaries
plcs |> 
  st_boundary() |> 
  mapglview(palette = "#FFAACC"
            ,size = 2) |> 
  mapglview(ri.pts
            ,zcol = "man_made")

# with a countinuous variable
plcs |> 
  mapglview(zcol = "aland")


```
